Description: Tiny bag of plain cotton cloth. A single strip folded at the bottom and seamed up the side and originally across the top, sewn thread linen. Contents - fragment of corroded iron(knife blade?), iron wrapped in a piece of cloth matching the bag - a bundle of coarse linen - a piece of grey alum(?).
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), unit 763 room 7 floor 1 upper fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
